xal.tools.database

Class ConcreteBlob

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.tools.database.ConcreteBlob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.sql.Blob

    public class ConcreteBlob
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.sql.Blob
    Concrete implementation of an SQL Blob.
